ai.ui.app module

app.py - Handles the OneTru AI Workbench Agent functionality

async ai.ui.app.chat_start()

Handles the start of a chat session.

Sends a welcome message to the user.

async ai.ui.app.handle_message(message: chainlit.Message)

Handles user messages, sends them to the server for processing, and displays the response back to the user.

Parameters:

message (cl.Message) – The message received from the user.

Returns:

None

Starts the FastAPI server for the OneTru AI Workbench.

  • port (int) – The port number.

ai.ui.utils module

Utilities for handling UI-related tasks for OneTru AI Workbench.

ai.ui.utils.init_config(log=False)[source]

Initialize configuration settings for the server, particularly logging.

Parameters:

log (bool) – Whether to enable logging mode. Defaults to False.

ai.ui.utils.handle_ui_message(message: str) → str[source]

Processes a UI message before displaying it.

Parameters:

message (str) – The raw message from the UI.

Returns:

The processed message, ready for UI display.

Return type:

str

ai.ui.utils.validate_message_format(message: str) → bool[source]

Validates if the given message follows the correct format.

Parameters:

message (str) – The message content to be validated.

Returns:

True if the message format is valid, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool
